title: Lagrangian Skeleta and Koszul Duality on Bionic Symplectic Varieties
authors: Gwyn Bellamy, Christopher Dodd, Kevin McGerty, Thomas Nevins
abstract:
We consider the category of modules over sheaves of Deformation-Quantization
(DQ) algebras on bionic symplectic varieties. These spaces are equipped with
both an elliptic $\mathbb{G}_m$-action and a Hamiltonian $\mathbb{G}_m$-action,
with finitely many fixed points. On these spaces one can consider geometric
category $\mathcal{O}$: the category of (holonomic) modules supported on the
Lagrangian attracting set of the Hamiltonian action. We show that there exists
a local generator in geometric category $\mathcal{O}$ whose dg endomorphism
ring, cohomologically supported on the Lagrangian attracting set, is derived
equivalent to the category of all DQ-modules. This is a version of Koszul
duality generalizing the equivalence between D-modules on a smooth variety and
dg-modules over the de Rham complex.
